alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:09PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 145 PM PDT... At 109 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, or near Idyllwild-Pine Cove, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Springs, Mt San Jacinto State Park, Idyllwild-Pine Cove, Hwy 243 Between Banning And Idyllwild, Hwy 74 Between Hemet And Mountain Center, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Mountain Center, and Lake Hemet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
